Background:

I was born in Kolkata, India. I graduated from Brandeis University with a Bacholors of Science in Computer Science and Economics with a Minor in Business in 2012. I studied abroad in Budapest, Hungary for a semester. This experinece enabled me to travel to a number of countries learning about new cultures.

I like learning new skills and challenging myself with new projects. I am motivated and a hard worker giving a 100% to every project. I am a very positive person and like to work with people.
